subject: Figure Skating
Olympic Games (2010)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The American figure skater, balanced on the edge between art and sport, clearly wants to be a star. The question is, can he still be a champion?
snippet: The American figure skater, balanced on the edge between art and sport, clearly wants to be a star. The question is, can he still be a champion?
